Subject.description: The subject line of the email

Date.description: The date and time the email was sent

Message-ID.description: A unique identifier for this email

Received.description: Shows the path the email took through mail servers
Shows the next step in the email's delivery path

MIME-Version.description: The version of the MIME protocol used

Content-Type.description: The type and encoding of the email content

Reply-To.description: The address to reply to, if different from the sender

BCC.description: Blind carbon copy recipient(s), usually hidden

X-Mailer.description: The software used to send the email
